author: dougm
msg: pulling config insert logic out of Apache__Directive.h so it can be
used elsewhere.  made more generic so it can be used at both startup

author: dougm
msg: LoadModule needs to be RAW_ARGS, else syntax error in httpd.conf if
mod_perl.so is loaded before any non-Perl LoadModules

author: dougm
msg: make sure MP_init_done is reset when we teardown.
(should only matter for static linkage, but doesn't hurt with dso)
